amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to enforce section 703 of the District of Columbia Firearms Control Act which requires certain firearms to be unloaded and disassembled.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill to enforce section 702 of the Firearms Control Regulations Act of 1975.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 259 - 161, 1 Present (Roll no. 349).
